tv.generator-info-name: Original XML Generated with Tempest EPG Generator (made by Kvanc) - Processed by BEVY Visual Processor v0.9

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Race to Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the House of Horrors.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another...

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: After barely surviving a violent attack by an elusive serial killer, a crime boss finds himself forming an unlikely partnership with a local detective to catch the sadistic killer.

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing shes a target herself

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the targets large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Our Season
programme.desc: Bok-Ja passed away. She receives a vacation from heaven and can be back to earth for 3 days. Bok-Ja looks after her daughter Jin-Joo, who can feel Bok-Ja is hovering around her.

programme.title: The Girl on a Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: Men of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Memories of the Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mothers surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as Nobleman...

programme.title: Officer of the Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when theyre forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.
